Title: Abbuzze! Der Badesalz Film
Actors: Gerd Knebel, Henni Nachtsheim, Martin Armknecht
Plot: On a Friday evening two men played by the comical duo 'Badesalz' get stuck in an elevator of a skyscraper. As there is no hope of being rescued during the weekend they try to divert themselves by letting go their fantasies on a jo...
